name: Dice Mage 2
summary:
With more magical dice duels, accessible yet strategic combat and many mystical worlds to explore, Dice Mage is now better than ever before! 

Win loot in high-stakes games of chance and battle your enemies with powerful spells on your quest to defeat evil.
info:
• 平台: iOS
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: roguelike-like， 回合制
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2017年8月9号
  • 售价: 免费
  • 发行: Tapinator, Inc
